fields.name: Baked Chicken
fields.ingredient: Full Chicken: 3lbs, Thyme: 3tsp, Garlic Powder: 3tbs, Oregano: 2tsp, Salt/Pepper: TT
fields.instruction: Season the chicken well on both ses. Place on a baking sheets, and cook for 45 minutes or until the inner tempature is 165 degrees

fields.name: Seared Steak
fields.instruction: Salt and pepper the steak six hours prior to cooking. set oven temp. to 200 and cook the steaks in there till the internal temp is 120. Sear both sides for 45 second on a both sides on a cast iron pan at 600 degrees

fields.name: Baked Potato
fields.instruction: Preheat the oven to 400, wash and poke holes in the potatos and coat with salt and pepper. Bake for an hour or until a fork can be poked with out much resistance

fields.name: Roasted Vegetables
fields.ingredient: White Onion: 1, Green Peppers: 2, Red Peppers: 1, Vegetable oil: 2tbs, Garlic Powder: 1tbs, Dried basil: 2tsp
fields.instruction: Preheat the oven to 400, wash then cut the vegetables to be about the same size. Place on a baking sheet, mix the herbs and oil then coat the vegetables. Cook in the oven for 10 minutes stir and then cook for another 10 minutes.

fields.name: Rice
fields.ingredient: Water: 2cups, Jasmine Rice: 1cup, Rice Wine Vinager: 2tbs
fields.instruction: In a pot add the water, rice and vinager. Bring to a boil, turn down the heat to medium/low and cover. Cook for 20 minutes.

fields.name: Scrambled Eggs
fields.ingredient: Eggs 2, Sour Cream: 1tbs, Salt/Pepper: TT, Cheddar Cheese: 2tbs, Garlic Powder: 1/4tsp, Butter: 2tbs
fields.instruction: In a frying pan melt the butter on low. Add the eggs and wisk them till well scrambled. Over the next 10 to 15 minutes slowly keep wisking until the eggs thicken to the point where it will become stable. Add seasonings, sour cream, and cheese. Mix till combined and serve.

fields.name: Chip Dip
fields.ingredient: Sour Cream: 2 cups, Soy Sauce: 1 tbs, Wostisher Sauce: 1 tsp, Tobasco: 1 tsp, Garlic Powder: 2 tsp, Ground Pepper: 1 tsp
fields.instruction: Mix the sour cream, soy sauce, wostishire sauce, tabasco sauce, garlic powder, and ground pepper together till everything is combined.
